articles.description: Maruti Suzuki has introduced four new colour options for the MY2022 Ciaz. The revised colour palette is similar to that of the upcoming Baleno facelift. The 2022 Ciaz is available in Celestial Blue, Opulent Red, Splendid Silver and Grandeur Grey.
articles.content:

articles.title: Tatas deploy HR experts for Air India synergy - Economic Times
articles.description: Air India's pilots had earlier written to its management to rectify multiple deductions and recoveries that have been projected in the arrears statement of many pilots.
